title: SMC_BlockSearchSavePos (FunctionBlock)
text:
FUNCTION_BLOCK SMC_BlockSearchSavePos
The function block is used to store the current position of a path.
SMC_BlockSearchSavePos
must run in the task of the interpolator.

rows.Name: ipo
rows.Comment: Instance of the interpolator of the path

rows.Name: bExecute
rows.Comment: Rising edge: Starts the saving of the current positionFalling edge: Resets the outputePos

rows:
potentially useful input when interpolating the same CNC-program
several times (as a whole), as we store the last object we worked on

rows.Name: ePos
rows.Comment:
Position information.
Requires connection to input ePos ofSMC_BlockSearch

rows: Error identificationPossible valuesSMC_BSSP_IPO_NOT_ACTIVE:When a rising edge is detected atbExecuteandSMC_Interpolatoris disabled, no position can be stored.
